author: The Wild Paul
comment: I had loved the app for the longest time, but one day for some unknown reason it just stopped working. I could go to my songs and play them like normal but no sound would come out (yes my volume was on and my speakers work) I had uninstalled and reinstalled several times thinking that it would work but it didn't. I have not see anyone else talk about this and I would like to bring it to iheart's attention. Hopefully they can fix it

author: DrDocDRM
comment: Fine, except for the constant "You've been selected by IHeart for a free 30 day trial" why do I keep getting selected?  I'm never that lucky in other drawings / lottery /slots. IHeart -  go ahead and give someone else a chance -  you don't have to keep congratulating me and selecting me.

author: Tika Majere
comment: Regularly repeating songs, ever since the update. Not really complaining, since my stations are full of favorites.  My local radio station is on here, but plays half the songs, then repeats them...because we won't notice our favorite riffs are missing...

author: Wayne Scott
comment: Could be a lot better needs a lot of work. For one I can't get any BBC radio stations like I am able to on most other similar apps.  1.Buffer time 2. direct station input 3. better search engine 4. player controls 5. Shoutcast search 6. Less intrusive advertising. (Video taking over is ridiculous)

author: Ashly Escarraz
comment: I really like it, but the ads can get frequent from time to time which can be sorta sickening sometimes. However; premium is relatively cheap and you get rid of ads plus you can use other features which are really nice to have. Overall I really like this app! I would definitely recommend this app to my friends! 😊
Worst app! After fifteen minutes of trying to get the radio station, and getting no where, I deleted and got another app that works just fine. I gave it five stars.

author: Leonel Fuentes
comment: Too many pauses. Like it loses signal every now and then. Bit sure if it's my phone or not LMK every I can do to help

author: Bill Oakes
comment: Always tells me I have no Internet connection and I have the best Internet my provider offers. Makes me want to check out other music providers sometimes.

author: Maryse Castro
comment: I used to love this app but I seem to always have problems processing my payment for the all access, I have no problem with any other app. It also irritates me that lately it has not been letting me create or add music to my playlist. Please fix this before I cancel my subscription and head elsewhere.

author: A Google User
comment: Changed 5 star to 1.  Fix this app.  Says no internet connection, and when I do finally get to the sign in screen message reads "logstepoperations: operations fail".  Unistall and reinstalled today because the search function would not find results for any search.  You would think a huge corporation that pushes their app would have better devs.  Fix for 5 stars and then quit messing with the app and causing problems!

author: Avery Yay!
comment: It's great!! BUT! I hate how you have to pay just to hear what you want..I think it's stupid that you have to pay JUST so you can listen to what you want and to make a play list!

author: Kimberly Garner
comment: This app does what it says and says what it does and I like that appreciate that this app is free of bugs except one thing sometimes when the songs are playing it stops or I can't load all the way I wish that you could fix those minor bugs and I will give you a5 star thank you.
Very impressed. Iv had paid spotify for years, tried iheart and am really impressed. Only thing i wish i could put songs on repeat. I did get the paid iheart but liked the free version also.

I love iheartradio! When you first download the app, it asks you your favorite genres of music. Then, there is the stations and podcasts according do the genres you like! I listen to it all the time when i'm not in my car. Amazing!!

author: Cayetano Sanchez
comment: It's the best free music app I've ever used! You don't need to spend hours making repetitive playlists, you just put in what genres you like and you can give feedback on individual songs. It custom tailors them to you! I do wish it had lyrics to the song, that would add to the experience. But otherwise Perfection.

author: Lisa Anderson
comment: I moved from my hometown, and unfortunately was not able to listen to my favorite station from back home. When I found I-Heart Radio, I found my home radio station and a couple other stations that I really like listening too!

author: Terry McCann
comment: I downloaded this app for specific podcasts I can't seem to get anywhere else. When opening the app I am blasted with songs that I didn't pick fom a genre that I hate. Just trying to get to my podcast list is a nightmare. I got ads popping up in my face, which might be acceptable if I were there for premium content. After all of that I get notification for new podcast episodes in my email. I go to play the new episodes and it will buffer for a short period then skip to the next one....and so on...and so on. Just a terrible app for podcasts.

author: Stuart Coker
comment: Would be great if it actually allowed you to remove recently played stations you accidentally bumped and they didn't pop back up repeatedly. Also,  if it didn't fill up recommended stations with things you have absolutely no desire to hear and is not at all related to your selected genres.

author: rickie campbell
comment: It's a classic app.. But has it's small issues.. Constantly hear the same songs.. But over all definitely better than regular radio and better than most music apps.

author: tammy garcia
comment: K-LOVE RADIO STATION IS THE ONLY ONES THAT I HAVE EVER HEARD THE RADIO PERSONALITIES PRAY ON AIR WITH PEOPLE.I LOVE ALL OF THEM.I LOVE Y'ALL BE BLESSED ALWAYS.

I just this for the very first time yesterday the 5th of March 2018 and I never thought I'd like it but WOW you surprised me! I always have been a huge Pandora fan but they have changed😐😑😥 Thank you for being so amazing with the songs not buffering and having a a thumbs up/down!!🌷💝

I love this app because it has hundreds of radio stations to choose from and thousands of artists to listen to. The best thing about iheartradio is, in my opinion, the fact that all the songs you thumb up become a part of your personalized radio station that you can listen to 24/7! All for free and free for all!

author: Hallie Chaffins
comment: Love the fact you have music, news, entertainment, podcast and so on! It's not just another music app, and that's why I like it! Free version does have ads, but I've listened to it for about 8 hours everyday for 5 days and just now got my first ad, so it's definitely not like it spams you! Loads fast and still plays with the screen off, just overall a great app!
title: Everything Under The Sun

author: Julie Lewis
comment: So much better than Google music and YouTube music. So many less commercials and interruptions.

Good app and i think it's cool you can explore & listen to new genres of music, with the thumbs up/down like the song or not.  Does'nt get much better than that.  That's probably why they call it I♡Radio.

author: Grant Geis
comment: Might as well change the name to iheart commercials... not bad when you finally get to hear a song or two through out a day tho

author: Brittany Marion
comment: It will be in the middle of a song then stop. No internet connection would be displayed when my phone has full LTE strength.
Awsome you will love it. Best app ever if you love good all around music. I am 62 years young and I can get my country and my gospel music. Love it thank y'all so much!!!!

author: Bluegem B
comment: I absolutely love this app!! Wish I had cancelled Pandora & tried it sooner!!! Love that I can take my favorite stations with me when we travel!! Also, love being able to find my favorite XM channels on the app, like Z100 in NY.

author: Brandy Stelzer
comment: Easy to use, especially when there is no good music on the local radio, just tap on your playlists and you can immediately have any song you want!!!

author: Christi Huff-Clements
comment: My go to every time for music whether I'm at home, work, in my car. Love it more and more by the day. I love all kinds of music so the best thing is no matter the mood I am in I have one place to go to to get what i want.

author: angela brogdon
comment: Love the radio station just do t have time to sit and make my own playlist but Iheart radio does it for me

author: Tim Wiedt
comment: Simply awesome!  You can listen to shows like The Kane Show any where, any time.  Endless selection. Sorry Sirius.                 Tim

author: Soul Sister Boutique
comment: Since upgrade it keeps telling me there's no internet connection which clearly I do.

reply.author: iHeartMedia, Inc.
reply.content: Hi, could you try uninstalling and reinstalling the app? If you continue to have trouble, please visit iHeartRadio.com/AndroidHelp and send us a message!

author: John Sterling
comment: Best internet radio app in Google Play Store. I always re-diownload the app whenever I get a new phone

author: BrendaAnn Addams
comment: So far, so good, an equalizer WOULD help, also a dynamic expander. Echo, surround sound, I'd love to get psycho on the sound!!!!

author: Schuyler Alf
comment: Great app, love the customizable stations! Would rate 5 Stars if I could actually play a specific song, rather than just build a station Around the artist/song (without a upgraded subscription, that is)

author: e r
comment: It's great, but the limited skips and random pausing is annoying. Other than that it's a great app

I've used iHeart Radio for awhile  I do pay for a subscription  I am happy with the app  The flexibility and it's eclectic  And diverse choices of music  And other options available  With my paid service   I'm an avid listener of most any style of music and the choice seem to be  Unlimited TY iHeart Radio

author: Rick Stockton
comment: Really great app! Had some trouble with it early on, but it is doing great on my Android phone!

reply.author: iHeartMedia, Inc.
reply.content: Hey Rick, we see you rated us one star. Could you let us know how we can help make your experience 5 stars? Send an email to android@iheartradio.com.
